---
title: "Summary RSF Tables"
output: pdf_document
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = '..')

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(magrittr)
library(data.table)
```


```{r, results = 'asis'}
summary <- readRDS('output/2-rsf/summaryRSF.Rds')

summary <- summary[!(season == 'winter' & species == 'bear')]

tabs <- summary[, {
  print(kable(
    .SD,
    format = 'latex',
    booktabs = TRUE,
    linesep = '',
    caption = paste0(.BY, collapse = ' ')
    ))
}, by = .(species, season)]

```
